DOC.brief_title: Minimizing Risk Maximizing Outcomes Geriatric Patients Through Integrated Clinical Pharmacy Services Innovative Model Community Practice
DOC.detailed_description: This single center , observational study determine geriatric patient five chronic medication difference clinical , humanistic , and/or economic outcome integrate clinical pharmacy service intervention . The primary efficacy objective assess single cohort , pair research design measure change baseline adherence rate , number medication relate problem , Beers criteria medication . The primary economic objective assess prescription revenue validate employment 0.5-1.0 Full-time equivalent ( FTE ) . Secondary efficacy objective assess single cohort , pair research design measure change baseline health literacy , optimization anthropometrics , health relate quality life ( HRQOL ) .
